text: Dead by Daylight is a horror survival multiplayer game with 5 players. Four are survivors, one is a killer. The survivors' objective is to repair five generators and open the exit gates to escape. The killer's objective is to place survivors on hooks before they escape. Characters in Dead by Daylight include Leon .S Kennedy, Ghostface and some crossover characters serve as cosmetics to original characters such as HUNK and James Sunderland. ==References== Category:2016 video games Category:2010s horror video games Category:Behaviour Interactive games Category:Indie video games Category:Multiplayer video games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Survival horror video games Category:Video games about cannibalism Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Xbox Series X and Series S games
title: Dead by Daylight
